Module game_2048
Package main.model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
main.model.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
Encapsulates and puts into context the functionality of CellGrid. Manages aspects of the game such as movement of cells, cell spawning and score tracking.
Author:
Alexander Tan Ka Jin

    • BoardToString

      public String BoardToString()
      Converts the board into string for ease of saving.
      Returns:
      A representation of the board as a string. Bars (|) represent cell borders while Percents (%) represent a new row.

    • Move

      public GameModel Move(MoveDirection dir)
      Moves in accordance with a given direction. If the grid changed states, then advances the turn.
      Parameters:
      dir - - The direction to move to (LEFT,RIGHT,UP,DOWN)
      Returns:
      This object
